org.osmdroid.samplefragments.layouts

Class CustomMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup
      • org.osmdroid.views.MapView
        • org.osmdroid.samplefragments.layouts.CustomMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.metalev.multitouch.controller.MultiTouchController.MultiTouchObjectCanvas<Object>, org.osmdroid.api.IMapView, org.osmdroid.views.util.constants.MapViewConstants

    public class CustomMapView
extends org.osmdroid.views.MapView
    The only delta with this class vs the standard mapview is that it overcomes some of the issues with the map view being inside of some kind of container which allows scrolling, such as scroll view recycler/card view created on 1/3/2017.
